TopicTitle: What are your ksp spotify radio stations?

Articles.Content:
what do you guys like to listen to on spotify as you play ksp? personally I set it to a radio station based on the music from interstellar

Edited January 20, 2015 by peachoftree

There's a radio station for Interstellar music?!?!

Anyways, oddly enough I like to listen to music from the Zac Brown Band. To me, they're the only good country music band out there right now. Why do I think country music goes so well with KSP? I have no idea.
What is a spotify and does it play casettes? Can't get a casette player anywhere these days.

What is a spotify and does it play casettes? Can't get a casette player anywhere these days.

What are casettes and do they involve LPs?

What are casettes and do they involve LPs?

Doh! Apparently casettes are cassettes, but it's been so long I've forgotten how to spell it ^^.

Cassettes were what my ZX81 programs were recorded on to before all those fancy steam floppy disks came along, before (desktop) hard disks, before CDs, before DVDs, waayyy before SSDs ...

I actually made a Spotify playlist called "Flight Montage."

To select songs for the list (yes, there was an application process XD), I muted a YouTube video of jets flying around cinematically and played songs. I added the songs to the playlist that were able to match the video.

There's a radio station for Interstellar music?!?!

Anyways, oddly enough I like to listen to music from the Zac Brown Band. To me, they're the only good country music band out there right now. Why do I think country music goes so well with KSP? I have no idea.

No, but the interstellar music is all on spotify
Winamp with my trusty Amon Amarth playlist(s)
I usually listen to my wife, nagging me to "quit that stupid computer game"..

I usually listen to my wife, nagging me to "quit that stupid computer game"..

This so, so, so, so much.

"You're not even a real astronaut, idiot!"
Thread (belatedly) moved to the Lounge, since it's not about KSP itself.

I like listening to some pop songs and podcasts on Spotify. To avoid the unstable network connection, I will download them via AMusicSoft Spotify Music Converter. After downloading them, I can enjoy those songs and podcasts offline. It is convenient.
